abstract: JPMorgan Chase is cutting its ties with a $600 million-plus private equity fund run by former Citigroup executives Robert B. Willumstad and Marjorie Magner, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase is cutting its ties with a $600 million-plus private equity fund run by former Citigroup executives Robert B. Willumstad and Marjorie Magner, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase is cutting its ties with a $600 million-plus private equity fund run by two former Citigroup executives, Robert B. Willumstad and Marjorie Magner, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: JPMorgan Said to Wind Down Brysam Capital
